resources.string: MainActivity (home/timeline) shows your recommendations (based on your likes (friend likes), what you have listened or some sponsored albums (also based on your likes.
This starts with an search box. \nBut also shows all the music categories (playlists) in a HorizontalScrollView. \nUnder that you can find all genres (this is also a new intent).
This shows the likes of the user of the app. This may be categorized by tracks/songs, albums and/or user accounts/artists.

Here the user of the app can change all settings. \nLike overlapping tracks (and the number of seconds), keep song playing in background, battery saver mode (this triggers multiple setting), only download tracks when connected to wifi, show friends list, ect.

Here you could find some info of the user that posted something. Every user may also upload tracks, these tracks are also displayed here. Maybe also a list of friends (if this is sellected in the settings menu)

Here you could see all genres. 
Like: 
Alternative rock
Classic 
Country 
EDM 
House 
Dubstep 
Indie

This activity should be an fragment. So that the content could be openend on every activity. Also this should be a persistence View that does not change when clicking on a new activity that activity does not trigger a new sound. \nThis Activity does play the music (track/album/artist/playlist/mood/genre/...)
